revised_title: Irrigation Schemes: Scientific Aspects and F.A.O. Contributions
tldr: The author welcomes participants to a meeting on irrigation schemes and highlights the role of F.A.O. in improving irrigation in developing countries. They also remember the late Howard Penman, a renowned scientist in the field of irrigation, who was enthusiastic about the meeting and would be missed for his contributions.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Agriculture and Soil Management
